full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,TSE RING MCHED LNGA'I GSOL MCHOD KYI CHO GA 'DOD 'JO'I BUM BZANG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(TSE RING MCHED LNGA'I GSOL MCHOD KYI CHO GA 'DOD 'JO'I BUM BZANG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RGYU MTSAN 'GA' ZHIG LA BRTEN NAS, RANG NYID KYI MOS PA'I 'TSAMS SBYAR TE, RJE BTZUN GYI DNGOS SLOB DAN RDZONG STON PA BHO DHI R'A DZA DANG, ZHVA DMAR PA DPAL CHOS KYI GRAGS PAS MDZAD PA'I GSOL KHA DANG, RJE BTZUN KUN DGA' SNYING POS SGRUB THABS RIN 'BYUNG DU GSUNG PA'I CHO GA BSGRIGS RNAMS GZHIR BZHAG PA LA MA TSANG BA KHA BSKANGS, GO RIM KHRIGS SU SDEBS, TSIG SBYOR 'GA' ZHIG GSAR DU BGYIS TE CHA TSANG LA 'KHYER BDE BAR, BTZUN GZUGS ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS GZHIS KA AO RGYAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DI BRTZOM PA'I MGO TSUGS PA NA PU MO GZHON NU MA LNGAS BZA' BTUNG STER BA DANG, MJUG RDZOGS SKABS GOS DAR DANG MU TOG 'BUL MKHAN BYUNG BA SOGS MA BSGRIGS RANG 'GRIGS KYI RTEN 'BREL RMAD DU BYUNG BA 'GRIGS SO, ,BKRA SHIS, ,)
